title: 0% attendance in Constitution despite attending every fucking class
content:
My attendance was never updated in Constitution (2nd Sem C Cycle) for some fuckass reason despite attending every class. Fuck should I do now smh

Will I get a backlog in this shitass subject if this issue is never fixed?

comments.body: Same issue with quite a lot of people I know
Then it means they fucked up somewhere u should be fine ngl, just ask some teacher
wait is it 0 for all students or is the prof for some weirdass reason taking attendance only for certain students?
The CR of my class went to the S&H HOD and she gave a vague answer which was something along the lines of "We're working on it."

At least half our batch has zero attendance and 90% of our batch has less than 75% attendance

ts pmo icl 💔🥀
Which means it doesn't matter, why are u panicking then , relax mate
Especially if half the batch has this issue why are u so worried lmao, they will simply ignore that subject for attendance 😭the only regret should be attending every class when it was a free pass
yep i can vouch ts is super annoying, I've attended every class and submitted whatever he wanted during the class but still have 0%, along with like half my class
that's weird but dw pes doesn't care about those courses' attendance

>ts pmo icl 💔🥀

Which language is this 😭
unc is too old for ts 🥀🥀🥀💔💔💔

They pulled this bullshit on us in 3rd sem for our 2-credit course. People had attendance as low as 20–30%, even though they attended all the classes. People complained and they added extra attendance and allowed everyone to write the ESA in the end.
"this shit pissed me off i can't lie"🙏
Don’t worry this happened even for us, some people despite attending almost every class had 0%. You will be fine
Did the teacher mark you as present in class. if they did then ur in the clear...sometimes some teachers don't update attendance on pesu
